benefits.title: Cashback Rewards
benefits.description: Earn 2% cashback on all purchases made with your CRED card this month.

benefits.title: Premium Lounge Access
benefits.description: Complimentary access to airport lounges worldwide for you and a guest.

benefits.title: Exclusive Gift Vouchers
benefits.description: ₹500 gift voucher for top brands. Valid for 30 days from claim date.

benefits.title: Fuel Surcharge Waiver
benefits.description: Get fuel surcharge waived on all fuel transactions at partner stations.

benefits.title: Coffee Subscription
benefits.description: Free premium coffee subscription for 3 months from our partner cafes.

benefits.title: Shopping Discounts
benefits.description: Up to 20% discount on fashion and lifestyle brands. Limited time offer.
